title: Kim Reynolds
added: In November 2020 Reynolds issued a statewide mask mandate, ordering anyone over age 2 to wear a mask in indoor public spaces; this reversed her previous claim that face masks are merely a "feel good" measure. She said, "No one wants to do this. I don't want to do this," adding "If Iowans don't buy into this, we'll lose. Businesses will close once again, more schools will be forced to go online, and our health care system will fail."<ref>{{cite news|url=https://www.npr.org/sections/coronavirus-live-updates/2020/11/17/935648739/iowa-governor-reverses-course-issues-mask-mandate-as-covid-19-cases-rise|title=Iowa Governor Reverses Course, Issues Mask Mandate As COVID-19 Cases Rise|last=Neuman|first=Scott|date=November 17, 2020|work=NPR|accessdate=17 November 2020}}</ref>
